类 SearchMethod

java.lang.Object
SearchMethod
直接已知子类:
Astar, Bidirectional, BreadthFirst, DepthFirst, GreedySearch, UniformCostSearch
public abstract class SearchMethod extends Object
Abstract base class for all search algorithms. Each search algorithm must extend this class and implement the findPath() method.

  • 方法详细资料

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes a new search. Must be called for a new search is conducted since it resets all necessary variables and data structures.

    • isInOpen

      protected boolean isInOpen​(Node n)
      Checks if a node is in the open list.
      参数:
      n - The node to check
      返回:
      True if the node is in the open list, false otherwise

    • findInOpen

      protected Node findInOpen​(Node n)
      Checks if a node is in the open list. If it is, the copy of the node in the open list is returned.
      参数:
      n - The node to check
      返回:
      The copy of the node (if found in open list), null otherwise

    • isInClosed

      protected boolean isInClosed​(Node n)
      Checks if a node is in the closed list.
      参数:
      n - The node to check
      返回:
      True if the node is in the closed list, false otherwise

    • findInClosed

      protected Node findInClosed​(Node n)
      Checks if a node is in the closed list. If it is, the copy of the node in the closed list is returned.
      参数:
      n - The node to check
      返回:
      The copy of the node (if found in closed list), null otherwise

    • isInOpenOrClosed

      protected boolean isInOpenOrClosed​(Node n)
      Checks if a node is in the open or closed lists.
      参数:
      n - The node to check
      返回:
      True if the node is in the open or closed lists, false otherwise

    • getConnectedNodes

      protected Vector<Node> getConnectedNodes​(Node n)
      Returns a list with copies of all nodes connected to the specified node.
      参数:
      n - The node to find connected nodes to
      返回:
      The list of connected nodes

    • reconstructPath

      protected Path reconstructPath​(Node n)
      Reconstructs a path by traversing from the end node back to the start node using the parent references. Use when you want to create the actual path from your search.
      参数:
      n - The end node
      返回:
      The path (a list of nodes)

    • getPath

      public Path getPath()
      Returns the found path.
      返回:
      The path

    • step

      public abstract boolean step()
      Finds a path from start to end node.
      返回:
      True when the search is ready, false if not ready.
